snippet: Three people were killed on Saturday when a house where fireworks were being made blew up in the same town recently hit by a devastating explosion of a fireworks market, local authorities said....

headline.main: Murray Wins First Title of Year in Dubai
headline.print_headline: Murray Wins First Title of Year in Dubai

lead_paragraph: Three people were killed on Saturday when a house where fireworks were being made blew up in the same town recently hit by a devastating explosion of a fireworks market, local authorities said.
